long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 I'm MAGgie, an all-in-one AI assistant for travel advisors, brought to you by Outside Agents, the largest host agency in the US. Install me, and I’m ready to be your best buddy. I provide support in various tasks, including bookmarking webpages/files, organizing research, crafting travel tales using AI, and be your personal chat assistant. 

💪Key Features: 

👉On-Page Actions 
✔️Save Pages/Files: easily save entire pages, sentences or files and add to your research
✔️Add Snippets: save important snippets from any webpage to your research library.

👉Enhanced Research Tools
✔️Folder Management: organize your research in folders for easy access and reuse. 
✔️File Upload: upload pdf files that you wish to your research

👉Personalized Travel Tales 
✔️Client Information: input client details, travel dates, and preferences. 
✔️AI-Powered Itineraries: generate beautifully crafted travel itineraries using GPT-4, personal research, and Outside Agents supplier information.

👉Chat with AI 
✔️Chat with files/tales: interact with your saved research or travel tales to get detailed insights. 
✔️Webpage Interaction: chat directly with any webpage to extract and understand information.

 💻 How to use: 

🔸Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to the toolbar. 
🔸Log in to your OA account. 
🔸Click on the blue genie icon to wake me up. 
🔸Start enhancing your travel planning with AI!

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:

📌 What browsers do you support?
Currently, I support Chrome.

📌 Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
No, you do not need to have a ChatGPT account to use this extension. 

📌Is it free to use?
Yes, MAGie is completely free to use and is covered by your Outside Agents plan. 

📪 Contact us: 
Any questions or suggestions? Please contact us at maggie@outsideagents.com. 

Try me now and revolutionise your travel planning with MAGgie, your AI-powered assistant brought to you by Outside Agents, the largest host agency in the US!
